card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I — Exile up to one target creature. II — Target creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn. III — Return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.text: Activated abilities of creatures you control cost X less to activate, where X is Agatha of the Vile Cauldron's power. This effect can't reduce the mana in that cost to less than one mana. {4}{R}{G}: Other creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample and haste until end of turn.

card.name: Agatha of the Vile Cauldron
card.text: Activated abilities of creatures you control cost X less to activate, where X is Agatha of the Vile Cauldron's power. This effect can't reduce the mana in that cost to less than one mana. {4}{R}{G}: Other creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample and haste until end of turn.

card.name: Agatha's Soul Cauldron
card.text: You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to activate abilities of creatures you control. Creatures you control with +1/+1 counters on them have all activated abilities of all creature cards exiled with Agatha's Soul Cauldron. {T}: Exile target card from a graveyard. When a creature card is exiled this way, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

card.text: Whenever an enchantment you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Ashiok, Wicked Manipulator
card.text: If you would pay life while your library has at least that many cards in it, exile that many cards from the top of your library instead. +1: Look at the top two cards of your library. Exile one of them and put the other into your hand. −2: Create two 1/1 black Nightmare creature tokens with "At the beginning of combat on your turn, if a card was put into exile this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature." −7: Target player exiles the top X cards of their library, where X is the total mana value of cards you own in exile.

That player shuffles, then draws card for each card exiled from their hand this way.

card.name: The Goose Mother
card.text: Flying The Goose Mother enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. When The Goose Mother enters the battlefield, create half X Food tokens, rounded up. Whenever The Goose Mother attacks, you may sacrifice a Food. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: The Goose Mother
card.text: Flying The Goose Mother enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. When The Goose Mother enters the battlefield, create half X Food tokens, rounded up. Whenever The Goose Mother attacks, you may sacrifice a Food. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: The Huntsman's Redemption
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I — Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token. II — You may sacrifice a creature. If you do, search your library for a creature or basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. III — Up to two target creatures each get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Three Blind Mice
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after IV.) I — Create a 1/1 white Mouse creature token. II, III — Create a token that's a copy of target token you control. IV — Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Three Bowls of Porridge
card.text: {2}, {T}: Choose one that hasn't been chosen — • Three Bowls of Porridge deals 2 damage to target creature. • Tap target creature. • Sacrifice Three Bowls of Porridge. You gain 3 life.

card.name: Thunderous Debut
card.text: Bargain (You may sacrifice an artifact, enchantment, or token as you cast this spell.) Look at the top twenty cards of your library. You may reveal up to two creature cards from among them. If this spell was bargained, put the revealed cards onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put the revealed cards into your hand. Then shuffle.

card.name: Thunderous Debut
card.text: Bargain (You may sacrifice an artifact, enchantment, or token as you cast this spell.) Look at the top twenty cards of your library. You may reveal up to two creature cards from among them. If this spell was bargained, put the revealed cards onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put the revealed cards into your hand. Then shuffle.

card.name: Torch the Tower
card.text: Bargain (You may sacrifice an artifact, enchantment, or token as you cast this spell.) Torch the Tower deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If this spell was bargained, instead it deals 3 damage to that permanent and you scry 1. If a permanent dealt damage by Torch the Tower would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Torch the Tower
card.text: Bargain (You may sacrifice an artifact, enchantment, or token as you cast this spell.) Torch the Tower deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If this spell was bargained, instead it deals 3 damage to that permanent and you scry 1. If a permanent dealt damage by Torch the Tower would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Totentanz, Swarm Piper
card.text: Whenever Totentanz, Swarm Piper or another nontoken creature you control dies, create a 1/1 black Rat creature token with "This creature can't block." {1}{B}: Target attacking Rat you control gains deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: Tough Cookie
card.text: When Tough Cookie enters the battlefield, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.") {2}{G}: Target noncreature artifact you control becomes a 4/4 artifact creature until end of turn. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Tough Cookie: You gain 3 life.

card.name: Troublemaker Ouphe
card.text: Bargain (You may sacrifice an artifact, enchantment, or token as you cast this spell.) When Troublemaker Ouphe enters the battlefield, if it was bargained, exile target artifact or enchantment an opponent controls.

card.name: Troyan, Gutsy Explorer
card.text: {T}: Add {G}{U}. Spend this mana only to cast spells with mana value 5 or greater or spells with {X} in their mana costs. {U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Twisted Fealty
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Create a Wicked Role token attached to up to one target creature. (If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. When this Aura is put into a graveyard, each opponent loses 1 life.)

card.name: Warehouse Tabby
card.text: Whenever an enchantment you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, create a 1/1 black Rat creature token with "This creature can't block." {1}{B}: Warehouse Tabby gains deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: Will, Scion of Peace
card.text: Vigilance {T}: Spells you cast this turn that are white and/or blue cost {X} less to cast, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
